name: Lutheran Homes Kitchener-Waterloo - Trinity Village Care Centre - Adult Day Program
comment:
Adult day program * social, recreational, and therapeutic activities for older adults, people with disabilities and for people with Alzheimer's disease and other related dementia in a group setting for part of the day * helps to support family caregivers who provide day-to-day care
  • meals
  • daily exercise programs
serviceProvisionCode: $21 per day * subsidy available for eligible participants * additional fee for transportation
